body:
To support reflection padding, I restructured the code so it first `clip/reflect` the `scalar_t` indices and then converting them to integral types. This is done in commit: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/10051/commits/36f2ebae879d323f97586b675edd69c04b529267

I'll add more description for the commit structure.
body_html:
To support reflection padding, I restructured the code so it first clip/reflect the scalar_t indices and then converting them to integral types. This is done in commit: 36f2eba

I'll add more description for the commit structure.
